971470.name: Scary Teacher 3D
971470.description:
Scary Teacher 3D puts you in the role of a mischievous student determined to outsmart your terrifying scary teacher, Miss T, by setting up hilarious pranks in her house.

Gameplay Highlights:

Explore & Prank: Navigate a detailed 3D environment, find clues, and execute creative traps to annoy Miss T.

Stay Stealthy: Avoid detection as Miss T patrols, sets traps, and locks doors to catch you.

Solve Puzzles: Use logic and timing to complete tasks and unlock new pranks across different levels.

Dynamic Challenges: Each level introduces fresh obstacles keeping you on your toes.

Laugh & Strategize: Experience the thrill of suspense mixed with humor as you watch Miss T’s over-the-top reactions.

With engaging puzzles, unpredictable challenges, and endless pranking fun, Scary Teacher 3D delivers a unique mix of strategy, humor, and stealth action. Can you stay ahead of the Scary Teacher?
971470.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
